title: Bolivia Signs $450Mln Lithium Deal With Russia
description: Under the agreement, the Russian firm's parent company, Rosatom, will invest in Bolivia over two years to build a pilot lithium plant in the country's south.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Russia Warns Against ‘Chaotic’ Fossil Fuels Exit
description: Russia's climate envoy nonetheless praised the "compromise" deal reached at the COP28 summit in Dubai on transitioning away from them.

title: Russian Activist Fined for Anti-FSB Protest After Transfer From Kyrgyzstan – NGO
description: Leftist activist Lev Skoryakin reportedly admitted his guilt, with his lawyer telling the judge that his client was “broken and unwilling to fight.”

title: In First, Russia Strips Naturalized Citizens of Passports
description: The amendments to Russia's citizenship laws came into effect in October and list more than 60 crimes as grounds for losing citizenship.

title: New Russian Owners ‘Squeezing Out’ Workers at Former Volkswagen Plant – Trade Union
